homepage.headline: I design and develop digital products.

mission.headline: Digital focus
mission.paragraph1: As an independent Digital Product Designer and Frontend Developer I conceive, design and develop digital products for companies and company founders. My goal is to make technical and complex processes user-friendly.
mission.paragraph2: For cross-platform solutions, I work with proven processes and state-of-the-art technology. In order to bridge functionality and design, I create comprehensively designed user interfaces for your website or app.

teaching.headline: I teach at the Digital Career Institute.
teaching.paragraph:
Since December 2018 I have taught over 100 participants about webdevelopment. I worked together with other teachers on the curriculum and taught the students how to program. 
 From HTML, CSS and JavaScript to React.js, Node.js and MongoDB I trained the students to become Fullstack JavaScript Developers.

hire.step1: I plan, conceive, design and realize your digital project.
hire.step2: I support your team with my competences in your project.
hire.step3: I'm giving her team a workshop to take you to the next level.
hire.step4: I'm talking about current topics in the field of design and development at your event.

section1.headline: About me
section1.paragraph: Hi, my name is Simon. I believe that the combination of good digital design and modern technology can improve products and how we deal with them. I am suspicious of what is and determined to change the way our digital products look and work.

section2.headline: Digital products by craftsmanship
section2.paragraph1: I develop every project, no matter if website or web app, individually by hand according to your needs. I use the latest technologies, which are also used by Google, Facebook, Airbnb or Trivago. I like to work with people who want to make a difference. And who have understood how digital projects work.
section2.paragraph2: I love what I do and I am constantly refining my ability to translate brand stories into a visually unique and engaging user experience.

section3.headline: Lecturer at the Digital Career Institute
section3.paragraph: Since December 2017 I have been teaching at the Digital Career Institute and since then I have taught more than 100 participants in Düsseldorf, Hamburg and Berlin about Modern Web Development and Digital Design.

service.headline: Digital focus with the user at the center

1.headline: Services
1.text: I see myself as your partner and work in the interest of your customers. Trust and honesty are important to me as the basis for a successful partnership. From the website to the app, from the first idea to the publication: I advise and accompany you through all phases - from planning to the finished concept.

3.headline: Process
3.text: Care and the right methodology lead to the success of every project and every idea.

text.1: This is where it all starts. We start with a first meeting to determine your needs. By gaining a clear understanding of the scope and cost of the project from the start, I can see what needs to be done in the short, medium and long term. My focus is on turning your business goals into communication goals and developing a clear action plan to get you where you want to go.
This is the backbone of my creative process. I deconstruct ideas into their simplest form, a process that helps me find the right positioning for the brand and product.
Here I turn ideas into prototypes. At this stage I know where we're going, but we're still halfway there.
Now things are taking shape. Once the concepts, mock-ups and prototypes are approved, I put together the best production team for the job.
